summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the pulse schedule assembler's ability to convert quantum pulse schedules into Qobj format, ensuring correct handling of experiment metadata, timing constraints, measurement mappings, memory slot allocation, local oscillator configurations, parametric pulse definitions, delays, discriminators, kernels, qubit initialization settings, and pulse name conflicts.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the pulse assembler generates accurate, backendâ€‘compatible Qobj objects for quantum experiments, covering a wide range of configuration scenarios and edge cases.
